MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 18-JAN-2021 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G44 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Kirkwell Road and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm due to underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 1:51 PM on Monday, 18 January 2021.
